name: Die Laughing: Deadpool Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Before becoming Deadpool, the mercenary killed an innocent woman. What was her name?
questions.explanation:
Mercedes.

	After botching an assignment, the man known as Jack was taken in by Wade and Mercedes Wilson. They were so kind to him that he decided to kill Wade and keep his identity. Instead of killing Wade, he killed Mercedes, and went insane as a result.

questions.text: Deadpool had cancer, which made him volunteer for the Weapon X program.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The treatment cured him of cancer and gave him a powerful healing factor, but drove him even further insane. It also scarred him horribly, which is why Deadpool is constantly masked.

questions.text: What odds did Deadpool have in the Dead Pool?
questions.explanation:
A Thousand to One.

	Brought to the "Workshop" along with other failed test subjects, Deadpool is tortured and experimented upon. The inmates run a dead pool, betting on who will be the next to die.

questions.text: In the videogame "Marvel Ultimate Alliance", why did Deadpool stab Weasel in the leg?
questions.correct: Weasel wanted the last Cheesy Puff.
options: Weasel wanted the last root beer.
Weasel wanted the last slice of pizza.
Weasel wanted the last Yankees ticket.
questions.explanation:
Weasel wanted the last Cheesy Puff.

	Deadpool gets much of his weapons from Weasel, and the two have worked out a friendship. However, Deadpool still mistreats Weasel due to his erratic personality.

questions.text: What is The Box filled with?
questions.explanation:
Sharp objects.

	The Box is a room full of sharp objects. So full, in fact, that it's best not to move around when one is in The Box. Blind Al is often put here by Deadpool.

questions.text: Deadpool's friend Blind Al is obviously blind. What is the name of her guide dog that Deadpool gives her as a present?
questions.explanation:
Deuce.

	Deuce used to belong to "Foggy" Nelson, Daredevil's best friend. Nelson gives the dog to Deadpool, who gives it to Blind Al, who hates the canine with a passion.

questions.text: With which other character did Deadpool share a comic title with starting in 2004?
questions.explanation:
Cable.

	Cable is Nathan Summers, son of Scott Summers and Jean Grey. He is a time-traveling mutant from the future who was infected with a techno-organic virus when he was a child.

questions.text: In order to be attacked by Wolverine, Deadpool uppercut which X-Man?
questions.explanation:
Kitty Pryde.

	"Snikt me!" Deadpool cried, referring to the sound made when Wolverine unsheathes his adamantium claws. Wolverine refused, so Deadpool hit Kitty Pryde to encourage him.

questions.text: When he's not home, Deadpool can often be seen at this hangout for mercenaries.
questions.explanation:
The Hell House.

	At the Hell House, Deadpool often has a rivalry with another mercenary named T-Ray, who claims to be the real Wade Wilson.

questions.text: The second time Deadpool died, at least four other Deadpools appeared. The insane one could only utter the phrase:
questions.explanation:
"No pickles!".

	The totally insane version of Deadpool could only utter "No pickles." There was also a superheroic version of Deadpool, a ruthless killer, and a standup comedian version of Deadpool.
